description.fr: {#CRITICAL}\_: Pose un {FloorMechanism:282} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de la cible.
description.en: {#CRITICAL}: Places one {FloorMechanism:282} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> the target.
description.es: {#CRITICAL}: Pone un {FloorMechanism:282} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> del objetivo.
description.de: {#CRITICAL}: Platziert ein\_{FloorMechanism:282} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> des Ziels.
description.pt: {#CRITICAL} Posiciona um {FloorMechanism:282} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> do alvo.
